eastern.description: Eastern vocalized form of this Syriac word.

gender.description: The gender of a Syriac adjective, noun, numeral, pronoun, suffix, or verb.

glosses.description: A hashmap with language name as a key and and array of text strings in that language

hasSeyame.description: Indicator to the presence of a Seyame in this word.

isEnclitic.description: Indicator if this Syriac word is an enclitic.

isLexicalForm.description: Indicator if this Syriac word is the lexeme form.

isTheoretical.description: Indicator if this Syriac word is theoretical or it is attested.

kaylo.description: The Kaylo or conjugation of a Syriac verb.

number.description: The number of a Syriac adjective, noun, suffix, or verb.

person.description: The person of a Syriac verb.

state.description: The state of a Syriac substantive or adjective.

suffixType.description: The type of suffix attached to the Syriac word.

syriac.description: Consonantal form of this Syriac word.

tense.description: The tense of a Syriac verb.

western.description: Western vocalized form of this Syriac word.

id.description: The SEDRA 'Id' used for referencing this object.

uri.description: Full URI of the SEDRA API reference for this object.

categoryType.description: The category of the Syriac lexeme or word.

syriac.description: Consonantal form of this Syriac lexeme.
